HEADLINE:
Intimation - Transcript of 61st Annual General Meeting held on July 27, 2022


Pursuant to Clause 15(b) of Schedule III, Part A, Para A read with Regulation 30 (2), Regulation 30 (6) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (as amended from time to time) ('SEBI LODR'), please find enclosed herewith transcript of 61st Annual General Meeting held on July 27,2022.

with reference of Intimation Dated 8th June,2022 & Intimation dated 11th June 2022 for Audio Link
